pull.title: [devtools] github-merge get toplevel dir without extra whitespace
pull.body: Fixes a bug in github merge when it runs the tests where the toplevel directory has an extra '\n' appended to the path string. Now it doesn't.

issue.title: devtools: show pull and commit information in github-merge
issue.body:
Print the number and title of the pull, as well as the commits to be merged.

Example:
![pullinfo](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/126646/12515063/a7f75b4a-c126-11e5-9109-484e6806d4d4.png)

events.body:
Nit about commit message: please use the

```
Ttitle line
(empty line)
Description...
```

format. Otherwise everything ends up in the subject line, when viewing in git log short format (as used by #7395).

events.message:
[devtools] github-merge get toplevel dir without extra whitespace

Fixes a bug in github merge when it runs the tests where the toplevel directory has an extra '\n' appended to the path string. Now it doesn't.
